title: (x) Faux Greek sans on NYC "to go coffee cup" - various alternatives {gang}
content:
I was recommended to see if any of you typhophile gurus know the font below, or something close to it.

Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140108052107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/82288091_4570.jpg)
author: ntedder

comments.content:
Close, but not really close at all would be [Lithos Pro Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140108052107/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/lithos/) with subbing some of the characters for the greeks that are included with the character set.

-  
penn

Adonais is closer and free. See it and a few alternatives:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=204&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=WE+ARE...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140108052107/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=204&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=WE+ARE+TO+SERVE&nb_ppp=50&psize=m&classt=pop "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=204&page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=WE+ARE+TO+SERVE&nb\_ppp=50&psize=m&classt=pop")
